HotelElement.Name: SpringHill Suites by Marriott San Antonio Medical Center/Crossroads

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Springhill Suites San Antonio Medical Center/Northwest in San Antonio (Northwest - Six Flags), you'll be within the vicinity of Wonderland of the Americas Mall and San Antonio Botanical Gardens. This hotel is within the region of Six Flags Fiesta Texas and AT&T Center.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 112 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and microwaves. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed, and all rooms are furnished with sofa beds. Cable programming and video-game consoles are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, as well as phones with free local calls.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and a 24-hour fitness center.

Dining
A complimentary full breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, express check-in, and express check-out. Planning an event in San Antonio? This hotel has facilities measuring 390 square feet (35 square meters), including a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is complimentary (available on request).


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
